Hi Vaibhav,

it could be caused by a lot of reasons. The best way to find o=
ut why the heritrix hangs up is checking this log file: $HERITRIX_HOME/heri=
trix_out.log

Hope it helps.

Cheers,

Adam


--- In archive-crawler@yahoog=
roups.com, vaibhav srivastava <sr.vaibhav@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
> 
> I have r=
ecently installed heritrix-1.14.3 in my system over fedora 12.

en I

 just

 it looks

X_HOME which
